languages.text: {n}Несколько тысяч невольников, активно участвовавших в бунте и убийстве коменданта, были выкурены газом, схвачены и преданы огненной казни в литейном прессе на глазах у прочих каторжан.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the prisoners that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько тысяч невольников, активно участвовавших в бунте и убийстве коменданта, были выкурены газом, схвачены и преданы огненной казни в литейном прессе на глазах у прочих каторжан.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Several thousands of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized and were executed with fire inside the foundry press in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousands of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized and were executed with fire inside the foundry press in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

{n}Several thousand of the prisoners that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几千名积极参与这场暴乱，还谋杀了典狱长的奴隶被催眠气体熏倒。他们遭到了逮捕、处决。随后，他们的尸体被丢进了铸造炉里，在所有囚犯面前烧成了灰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几千名积极参与这场暴乱，还谋杀了典狱长的奴隶被催眠气体熏倒。他们遭到了逮捕、处决。随后，他们的尸体被丢进了铸造炉里，在所有囚犯面前烧成了灰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Varios miles de esclavos que participaron activamente en el motín y en el asesinato del superintendente han sido ahumados con gas, apresados y ejecutados, incinerados en los fuegos de la prensa de fundición, delante de otros convictos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Varios miles de esclavos que participaron activamente en el motín y en el asesinato del superintendente han sido ahumados con gas, apresados y ejecutados, incinerados en los fuegos de la prensa de fundición, delante de otros convictos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}暴動と管理者の殺害に積極的に加担した数千人の奴隷は、ガスで燻り出され、取り押さえられ、他の受刑者の前で、鋳造所のプレス機の火で火炙りの刑に処された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}暴動と管理者の殺害に積極的に加担した数千人の奴隷は、ガスで燻り出され、取り押さえられ、他の受刑者の前で、鋳造所のプレス機の火で火炙りの刑に処された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plusieurs milliers d'esclaves ayant participé activement à l'émeute et au meurtre du directeur sont délogés au gaz, capturés, exécutés et incinérés dans les fourneaux de la fonderie devant les autres détenus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plusieurs milliers d'esclaves ayant participé activement à l'émeute et au meurtre du directeur sont délogés au gaz, capturés, exécutés et incinérés dans les fourneaux de la fonderie devant les autres détenus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mehrere tausend der Sklaven, die aktiv an den Aufständen und dem Mord am Direktor beteiligt gewesen waren, wurden mit Gas ausgeräuchert, festgenommen und hingerichtet. Vor den Augen der anderen Sträflinge wurden sie in den Feuern der Gießereipresse eingeäschert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Several thousand of the slaves that actively partook in the riot and the superintendent's murder have been smoked out with gas, seized, and executed, cremated in the fires of the foundry press, in front of other convicts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere tausend der Sklaven, die aktiv an den Aufständen und dem Mord am Direktor beteiligt gewesen waren, wurden mit Gas ausgeräuchert, festgenommen und hingerichtet. Vor den Augen der anderen Sträflinge wurden sie in den Feuern der Gießereipresse eingeäschert.{/n}
